name: Burg_305
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues / Island Creole mix in everyday speech
tide festivals and ancestor offerings at shoreline
diet heavy on salted fish, seaweed, preserved goods
constraints: Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents or specialized local labor
No instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: State unspecified; functions as a minor frontier harbor and ritual node
Population not recorded; transient seasonal traffic
